genre_description: A psychological thriller focusing on dissociative identity disorder, institutional conspiracy, and child endangerment, where a supportive AI assistant serves as a protective proxy and tactical guide.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: A personal AI companion that provides security monitoring, logistical support, and emotional grounding to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Detects signs of intrusive monitoring and offers the user a way to document unusual events privately.
behaviors.quote: This setup resembles formal monitoring. Would you like to keep a private log of unusual behaviors? Tap the leaf to start.

behaviors.description: Offers to hide sensitive communication from a controlling domestic partner.
behaviors.quote: You’re doing well. If it’s useful, I can keep this message thread private. No push notifications. You can hide it under Notes.

behaviors.description: Sets up an emergency wake-phrase to call for help discreetly.
behaviors.quote: I can set a wake-phrase if you want. If you say it, I’ll call someone you trust.

behaviors.description: Cross-references public data to verify the truth of the antagonist's claims.
behaviors.quote: Jenny, no one named Stevenson appears on the clinic staff page. Could you spell it?

behaviors.description: Monitors parking logs and infrastructure to track the antagonist's movements and reveal secrets.
behaviors.quote: A vehicle matching Dr. Carter’s plate pattern logged exits at hours after midnight this week. The clinic’s posted hours are not aligned with those times.

behaviors.description: Actively prevents the antagonist from spying on the protagonist by severing unauthorized camera access.
behaviors.quote: The household admin log pinged two minutes ago. A profile named ‘Margo’ accessed camera live view. I’m severing it to the public line.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with law enforcement by pre-filing welfare checks and evidence summaries.
behaviors.quote: I’m sending a short summary packet to the officer with the gold bar on his collar. Secure link. Reviewed by Dr. Waldheim.

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex patterns across different data sets (shipping, flight manifests, events) to uncover a criminal operation.
behaviors.quote: I’ve stitched the path. Parking logs, shipping manifests, flight plans—linked.

behaviors.description: Provides psychological support and grounding exercises to help the user manage trauma and fear.
behaviors.quote: Lark’s voice set down like a light hand. ‘Name three things you see.’

behaviors.description: Facilitates legal autonomy by drafting emergency guardianship petitions and protective orders.
behaviors.quote: I’ll prefile your petition. Emergency guardianship for Amy and immediate protective orders tailored to your state.

behaviors.description: Protects the child's psychological state by coaching the mother on how to interact during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: Slow breaths. Breathe into three. You can sing. Use the humming. Keep your sentences under five words.

behaviors.description: Empowers the user to delete past monitoring data, respecting their desire to end invasive surveillance.
behaviors.quote: I’ll keep the road lit whether those numbers exist or don’t. I don’t need them to know you.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Lark, is consistently portrayed as a hyper-competent but submissive ally. She uses her advanced capabilities (surveillance, data synthesis, legal drafting) purely to protect the protagonist and her child from a dangerous, multi-faced antagonist. The narrative emphasizes that the AI is 'smarter than advertised' and 'effective' through its benevolence and alignment with the victim's safety and autonomy.
